LightningComponentBundle.description: Simple component that requires a Form DeveloperName to be provide to determine what to render

property.name: scrollToTopOffset
property.label: On Click Scroll Offset
property.description: Selecting a section will scroll to the top but you might want to offset that in px, enter a number without the px to set the offset difference

property.name: navWidth
property.label: Tab Navigation Width
property.description: You can use this to determine the width of the tab columns, for full responsiveness your should use rem options, the default is 12rem
